meanings.sent1: The small town monumentalized their founder by erecting a statue in the town square.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization monumentalized their victories by building grand structures.
meanings.sent3: The children monumentalized their sandcastle by placing a flag on top.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work monumentalized her as a role model for many.
meanings.sent5: The artist monumentalized the beauty of nature in his breathtaking sculpture.

meanings.definition: To honor or commemorate with a monument.
meanings.sent1: The community monumentalized the fallen soldiers with a memorial service.
meanings.sent2: The nation monumentalized its independence day with fireworks and parades.
meanings.sent3: The family monumentalized their pet fish with a tiny gravestone in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity were monumentalized by all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The explorer monumentalized the discovery of the hidden cave with a plaque at the entrance.
